txt.en: 'I am ready to help you learn how to become a more effective Mariner. As you gain levels, more skills will be available for you to unleash upon your foes.\n\n'Use your skill <rgb=#00ff00>Thrust</rgb> against a Training Dummy. You will find that certain skills move your Balance either towards the Fore or to the Aft, which will have various effects upon your combat ability!'
'Well done, [placeholder]!  As you grow as a [placeholder], you will find that there are much more powerful new skills available for you. Good luck!'
'Strike the training dummy with your skill and return to me. We must make certain that you are prepared to stand against the dangers of Middle-earth.'
Your trainer wants you to use your skills to prove that you are ready to face the many dangers that exist in the world.
Use your Thrust skill on the Training Dummy ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Use your skill <rgb=#00ff00>Thrust</rgb> on the training dummy nearby.
Talk to Barton Halifax, the Mariner Trainer in Archet
Barton Halifax, the Mariner Trainer, is in Archet, west of the training grounds.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your skill, you should return to your trainer and tell him of your success.
